price: Kada maganarsu* ta sanya ka a cikin baƙin ciki. Lalle ne alfarma ga Allah take gaba ɗaya. Shi ne Mai jĩ, Masani.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
footnotes: * Maganarsu ta izgili a gare ka. Idan Allah Ya ɗaukakã ka, bãbu mai iya hanãwa dõmin Shi kaɗai ne Mai izza kuma sai inda Ya sanya ta ga wanda Ya so.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥzunka qawluhum inna al-ʿizata lillahi jamīʿan huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
